policy_list_original.name: [Customized] Azure-VM-resource-20 core
policy_list_original.description: Azure VM 資源符合 20 core

policy_list_original.name: [Customized] Azure-VM-resource-32 core
policy_list_original.description: Azure VM 資源符合 32 core

policy_list_original.name: [Customized] Azure-VM-resource-16 core
policy_list_original.description: Azure VM 資源符合 16 core

policy_list_original.name: [Customized] Azure-VM-resource-48 core up
policy_list_original.description: Azure VM 資源大於等於 48 core

ec2aafe2-5c14-4bbc-9641-1c31a17c6cc5.name: [Customized] Azure-VM-resource-16 core
ec2aafe2-5c14-4bbc-9641-1c31a17c6cc5.description: Azure VM 資源符合 16 core

fc79e312-9fb0-4092-b7a1-7c52f824e663.name: [Customized] Azure-VM-resource-20 core
fc79e312-9fb0-4092-b7a1-7c52f824e663.description: Azure VM 資源符合 20 core

4b357a61-e238-4ebc-a650-6510079c1a80.name: [Customized] Azure-VM-resource-48 core up
4b357a61-e238-4ebc-a650-6510079c1a80.description: Azure VM 資源大於等於 48 core

156fc109-bf19-49dc-adc7-3d0ec5469c88.name: [Customized] Azure-VM-resource-32 core
156fc109-bf19-49dc-adc7-3d0ec5469c88.description: Azure VM 資源符合 32 core

89e59b1c-65e1-4773-a3e2-4f0668100f73.name: Azure_VM_48core_up
89e59b1c-65e1-4773-a3e2-4f0668100f73.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-vm-list' AND json.rule = (['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_D48_v3" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_D64_v3" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_E48_v3" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_E64_v3")

d583bad2-d755-4aa5-a046-1b4e4f3a6520.name: Azure_VM_32core
d583bad2-d755-4aa5-a046-1b4e4f3a6520.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-vm-list' AND json.rule = (['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_D32_v3" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_E32_v3" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_G5")

00877d96-25be-4134-ada9-6fa5e98094df.name: Azure_VM_20core
00877d96-25be-4134-ada9-6fa5e98094df.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-vm-list' AND json.rule = ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_D15_v2"

c544d8dd-1b83-45c4-9bcb-1d6547d14e7a.name: Azure_VM_16core
c544d8dd-1b83-45c4-9bcb-1d6547d14e7a.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-vm-list' AND json.rule = ( ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "A9" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "A11" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_D14" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_D5_v2" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_D14_v2" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_D16_v3" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_E16_v3" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_G4" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_H16m" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_H16r" or ['properties.hardwareProfile'].vmSize equals "Standard_H16mr")
